attributes.action: Represent Great Britain in the EU, protecting and building on our power to fight for human rights for all nations around the globe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop immigrants that leave their families in foreign lands from entering the EU under the false ideal of an easier life. These people are often taken advantage of and denied basic human rights.

Stop Malta, a long time ally, from becoming a drop off point for illegal immigrants that are heading for mainland Europe and the UK.

I love my country, the United Kingdom and I also pay homage to my heritage in Malta and the history of these two great nations.
